metadata.description: Workflow skills for Claude Code - each produces tangible output

plugins.name: all
plugins.description: All workflow skills: Cloudflare Workers, Tailwind themes, favicons, icons, colour palettes, ElevenLabs agents, MCP servers.

plugins.name: skill-creator
plugins.description: Create new skills following Anthropic's official spec.

plugins.name: cloudflare-worker-builder
plugins.description: Scaffold and deploy Cloudflare Workers with Hono + Vite.

plugins.name: tailwind-theme-builder
plugins.description: Set up Tailwind v4 + shadcn/ui with dark mode theming.

plugins.name: color-palette
plugins.description: Generate colour palettes from brand hex.

plugins.name: favicon-gen
plugins.description: Generate favicon packages from logos, text, or brand colours.

plugins.name: icon-set-generator
plugins.description: Generate custom SVG icon sets with consistent style.

plugins.name: elevenlabs-agents
plugins.description: Build ElevenLabs conversational AI voice agents.

plugins.name: memory-manager
plugins.description: Audit and restructure CLAUDE.md memory hierarchy.
